summary: Pointy pearly whites for vanilla Serana
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/39951-2-1376005524.png[/img]

Author: MadCat221 (MadCat221@gmail.com)

Version: 1

August 8, 2013

1. Introduction
2. Installation
3. Credits
4. Version History

===============
1. INTRODUCTION
===============

So many mods out there that gussy up Serana, including many that give her fangs. But what about those of us who thinks she's pretty as-is, and just want her to have fangs?

This mod does some NIFSkope surgery and some fake-headbake trickery to give her (and her parents) fangs based on facebaking assets provided by Aipex8 and his Better Vampire Fangs And Eyes mod. Tested to make sure that the notorious finickyness of the face-bake system doesn't make the face tinting disappear.

===============
2. INSTALLATION
===============

Unpack the loose files into your Skyrim/Data folder. If you get any overwrite notifications, then you have another mod that alters Serana and her parents. As noted, this mod is meant for those who just want Vanilla-faced Serana and her parents to have fangs.

Since this mod replaces her head, if you choose to cure her it is recommended to uninstall this mod. Otherwise, she'll still have fangs.

==========
3. CREDITS
==========

Aipex8 for making the Better Vampire Fangs And Eyes mod, which makes vampires have fangs that don't require them to unhinge their jaw to take a bite, and also re-facebakes all vanilla vampire heads to match. DL here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38829/?]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38829/?[/url]

==================
